name: howtousees6directlyinbrowser
description: How To Use ES6 Code Directly In Browser

scripts.pkijs:init: rm -rf "./application/pkijs" && mkdir "./application/pkijs" && cp ../../src/* ./application/pkijs && sed -i "s/\"asn1js\"/\"..\/asn1js\/asn1.js\"/g" ./application/pkijs/* && sed -i "s/\"pvutils\"/\"..\/pvutils\/utils.js\"/g" ./application/pkijs/* && sed -i "s/\"bytestreamjs\"/\"..\/bytestreamjs\/bytestream.js\"/g" ./application/pkijs/*
scripts.build: npm run pkijs:init && npm run asn1js:init && npm run pvutils:init && npm run bytestreamjs:init

author: Yury Strozhevsky (yury@strozhevsky.com)
